choices: Helen, a mutual friend of the girls
1.content:
Ben’s head feels extremely fuzzy from the night before, he is so tired and he’s got this awful Pounding headache. Ben is a tall, pale 20 year old college student. He’s got a mop of curly brown hair and a short scruffy beard. He works pretty hard, and cares a lot about his friends, but Can’t help the itch to go party On the weekends. Last night seems to have been pretty rough, Ben got up and looked around at his surroundings remembering he had been at a party hosted by his friends Sarah, Alice and Brooklyn, who all lived together.

Had I passed out at their place? he thought to himself. Opening his eyes and taking a quick glance around nothing looked familiar. There was this thick fuzz all over the ground and the ceilings where so high in the air.

“Where the hell am I?” Ben said aloud.

All the sudden the ground started trembling like an earth quake was happening. Ben lost his footing and fell to the floor.

BOOM

BOOM

BOOM

And then he realized what was happening, this fuzz was a carpet, that wall was the leg of a couch, he was shrunk, and through the gaping Hole in the wall emerged...
1.title: You wake up

info.brief_description: Will you survive a house full of giant college girls?
info.description:
Ben is absolutely hammered at a party in his friends apartment and wakes up the next Day shrunken! Will he survive? Or will the three girls living in the second story apartment get the better of him?

Please Add, but follow some guidelines:
Giant girls only, no giant guys
Deaths are encouraged but try to add an option to continue
